product.longDescription: To honor Eliot Coleman and his role in developing many of our long-handled tools, this Maine-made handle is engraved with his signature. The 1 1/4" diameter shaft provides a comfortable and secure grip, as the midsection is slimmer. Finished with Tried and True Danish Oil. Made of ash wood. Includes a #10 x 3/4" pan head screw for assembly. 59" long. Approximately 1.2 lbs. Compatible with the following tool part number: 9156.

Handle Six-Row Seeder Accessory

Product ID:7839.07839

To honor Eliot Coleman and his role in developing many of our long-handled tools, this Maine-made handle is engraved with his signature. The 1 1/4" diameter shaft provides a comfortable and secure grip, as the midsection is slimmer. Finished with Tried and True Danish Oil. Made of ash wood. Includes a #10 x 3/4" pan head screw for assembly. 59" long. Approximately 1.2 lbs. Compatible with the following tool part number: 9156.
